content: materials - 5 skeins of blue sky alpaca s worsted 50% royal alpaca and 50% merino or 500 yards of another worsted weight 1 yarn this color is ecru #2003 - a us 17 12 mm 32 inch circular needle 2 - a replaceable jumbo stitch marker 3 gauge 15 stitches = 4 inches in herringbone stitch size 58 inches circumference x 14 inches high 1 https //www purlsoho com/yarn/knitting-crochet html yarn_stitches_per_inch_filter=971 2 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=23796 3 https //www purlsoho com/jumbo-locking-stitch-markers html
